entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:02 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:02 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
